gold.user: Admin user requesting a list of all circuit groups.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of circuit groups with their details.

gold.user: Network engineer creating a new circuit group.
gold.ideal: Creates a new circuit group and returns its details.

gold.user: Support staff retrieving details of a specific circuit group.
gold.ideal: Returns the details of the specified circuit group.

gold.user: Admin updating the details of a circuit group.
gold.ideal: Updates the circuit group and returns the updated details.

gold.user: Admin deleting an obsolete circuit group.
gold.ideal: Deletes the specified circuit group and confirms deletion.

gold.user: Network administrator checking all circuit terminations.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of all circuit terminations.

gold.user: Technician adding a new circuit termination.
gold.ideal: Creates a new circuit termination and returns its details.

gold.user: Engineer retrieving a specific circuit termination.
gold.ideal: Returns the details of the specified circuit termination.

gold.user: Admin updating specific fields of a circuit termination.
gold.ideal: Partially updates the circuit termination and returns updated details.

gold.user: Admin removing an outdated circuit termination.
gold.ideal: Deletes the specified circuit termination and confirms deletion.

gold.user: Network planner reviewing all circuit types.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of all circuit types available.

gold.user: Admin creating a new circuit type.
gold.ideal: Creates a new circuit type and returns its details.

gold.user: Support staff checking details of a specific circuit type.
gold.ideal: Returns the details of the specified circuit type.

gold.user: Admin updating a circuit type's details.
gold.ideal: Updates the circuit type and returns the updated details.

gold.user: Admin deleting an obsolete circuit type.
gold.ideal: Deletes the specified circuit type and confirms deletion.
